title: Full kitchen in apartment, Large studio apartments, Free premium cable
posting_body: ['Craig Apartments in Las Vegas', 'Low Weekly & Monthly Rates', 'FREE Utilities', 'Free Premium Cable TV', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Additional Information:', '<URL>', 'Apartment Home Features', '-Apartment near Nellis Air Force Base', '-Laundry facilities', '-Full kitchen in apartment', '-Unfurnished apartments', '-Siegel Rewards Program', '-Large one bedroom apartments', '-Fully furnished apartments', '-On RTC Las Vegas bus lines', '-Bad Credit Ok', '-Free utilities included with apartment', '-No long term lease required', '-Large studio apartments', 'Free Siegel Reward Program', 'Earn points every time you pay your rent or refer a friend.', 'Use your points to treat yourself to', 'free rent, food, movies, gift cards', ', and much more!', 'Pet Policy', '20lb weight limit and aggressive breeds such as Pit Bulls and Rottweilers are prohibited.', 'Managed by The Siegel Group', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Pricing may include current special and is subject to change without notice.']
